LanguageData.Bullet_DMS_HeavyMachineGun.label: heavy machine gun bullet
LanguageData.DMS_Autocannon.label: Mech Autocannon
LanguageData.DMS_Autocannon.description:
An autocannon designed for mech soldier or mounting on to an infantry support platform.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use,it's so heavy only specific automatroids can operate it unless its mounted to a support platform.
LanguageData.DMS_Autocannon.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Autocannon.tools.barrel.label: barrel

LanguageData.DMS_Gun_2A38M.label: 2A38M
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_2A38M.description:
A dual-barrel heavy autocannon for infantry suppression and anti air needs.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use,it's so heavy only specific automatroids can operate it.

LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.label: MPQFS-85M "Dawnblade"
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.description:
A multi-role quick-firing autocannon modified for mech use. The weapon is only capable of being mounted on super-heavy units like the Tarbosaurus. Its terrifying rate of fire and power have proven to be effective at destroying exostriders in past mechanoid wars.
This weapon is designed exclusively for use on super-heavy units or to be installed as an emplacement.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.tools.muzzle-0.label: muzzle
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.tools.muzzle-1.label: muzzle
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonGrenade.label: Mech Heavy Grenade Launcher
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonGrenade.description:
A hand held mortar designed for mech operation built with a six round revolving action to allow for quick successive shots.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use,it's so heavy only specific automatroids can operate it.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonGrenade.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.label: Mech Anti-Tank Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.description:
A lightweight mass producable anti-tank rifle for heavy mechs and dragoons.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use,it's so heavy only specific automatroids can operate it.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Recoilless.label: Recoilless Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Recoilless.description:
A recoilless rifle designed to counter heavy-armored targets at range.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use,it's so heavy only specific automatroids can operate it.

LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGun.label: Mech HMG
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGun.description:
A heavy machine gun for mech soldiers or infantry support platforms.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use,it's so heavy only specific automatroids can operate it unless its mounted to a support platform.

LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.label: Bolt Cannon
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.description:
An ultra heavy rifle chambered in autocannon rounds. This rifle has proven the capability to reach out and touch an exostrider at immense distances. It is specifically designed for long-range anti-mech operations.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use,it's so heavy only specific automatroids can operate it.
